metadata.Title: CVE-2022-44640 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heimdal before 7.7.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because of an invalid free in the ASN.1 codec used by the Key Distribution Center (KDC).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44640` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

heimdal-clients - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm3
heimdal-kcm - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm3
heimdal-kdc - 1.7~git20150920+dfsg-4ubuntu1.16.04.1+esm3
